subject: Horse Racing
Street Sense (Race Horse)
Kentucky Derby
Horses
lead_paragraph: The Travers Stakes, a race that once promised a rematch among this year’s winners of the three Triple Crown events, has been whittled to Street Sense and a handful of second-tier horses.
snippet: The Travers Stakes, a race that once promised a rematch among this year’s winners of the three Triple Crown events, has been whittled to Street Sense and a handful of second-tier horses.
